faq.a1: Who is Scale for? Scale is built for construction material yards that want to save on purchasing. It’s also for suppliers and manufacturers who want to sell larger volumes more easily.
faq.a2: How does group buying help yards? By combining orders, yards gain more buying power, unlocking better prices and deals from suppliers.
faq.a3: When will my order be delivered? Your order will be delivered within the timeframe you choose upon joining the deal.
faq.a4: What happens if the group deal doesn’t reach the target? If the deal doesn’t reach the required quantity, you choose:Either get a refund or use the same amount to join another deal for the same or a different material.
faq.a5: How do I place an order? Just send your request on WhatsApp and  we’ll handle the rest.
faq.a6: Yes, each group deal has its own minimum, shown in the deal details.
faq.a7: We’ll notify you as soon as the deal is full and confirmed for delivery.
faq.a8: Yes, delivery is included in the listed price.
faq.a9: Not at this phase, We currently support group orders only.
faq.a10: Currently, we operate in Riyadh only. More cities coming soon.

dealTabs.p2: Your order is only confirmed once full payment is received through the provided secure payment link. Unpaid orders  will not be processed.
dealTabs.p3: Ordersare dispatched only after the deal closes and the bulk order is processed. Delivery timelines may vary depending on the supplier location and shipment volume.
dealTabs.p4: In rare cases where the product becomes unavailable after the deal ends, you will be notified and refunded promptly.
dealTabs.p5: Refunds are only issued if the deal does not reach the minimum buyer count or if the order is canceled by the supplier. Buyer-initiated cancellations after payment may not be eligible.
dealTabs.p6: All updates regarding your order will be shared via WhatsApp or email. For any questions, feel free to contact our support team directly through the quick support link provided.
dealTabs.p7: Product images are for reference only. Please review product specs and descriptions carefully before joining a deal.
dealTabs.guidelinesPara: To secure your spot in this group deal, we kindly ask you to complete the payment in advance using the secure link we’ll send after you join. This helps us confirm your participation and include your order in the collective shipment with others. Once your payment is successfully received, your order will be officially locked in at the discounted price — no surprises or hidden charges. You’ll receive a confirmation receipt via email or WhatsApp, along with updates about the next steps in the fulfillment process. If you have any questions during or after payment, our support team is just a message away and happy to assist. Thank you for being part of the ter shopping starts here!
